         <script>
          var timeout = 500;
     var closetimer = 0;
     var ddmenuitem = 0;
 
     // open client solutions div menu layer
     function mopen(id) {
         // cancel close timer
         mcancelclosetime();
 
         document.getElementById("MainNavigation").style.paddingBottom = "0px";
         if (id == "Leistungen_germ") {
             document.getElementById("Leistungen_germ").style.display = '';
             document.getElementById("Wiruberuns_germ").style.display = 'none';
             document.getElementById("Karriere_germ").style.display = 'none';
         } else if (id == "Wiruberuns_germ") {
             document.getElementById("Wiruberuns_germ").style.display = '';
             document.getElementById("Leistungen_germ").style.display = 'none';
             document.getElementById("Karriere_germ").style.display = 'none';
         } else {
             document.getElementById("Wiruberuns_germ").style.display = 'none';
             document.getElementById("Leistungen_germ").style.display = 'none';
             document.getElementById("Karriere_germ").style.display = '';
         }
 
         //aboutusMenu
 
     }
     // close client solutions div menu layer
     function mclose() {
         document.getElementById("Leistungen_germ").style.display = 'none';
         document.getElementById("Wiruberuns_germ").style.display = 'none';
         document.getElementById("Karriere_germ").style.display = 'none';
         document.getElementById("MainNavigation").style.paddingBottom = "18px";
     }
 
     // go close timer
     function mclosetime() {
         closetimer = window.setTimeout(mclose, timeout);
     }
 
     // cancel close timer
     function mcancelclosetime() {
         if (closetimer) {
             window.clearTimeout(closetimer);
             closetimer = null;
         }
     }
 
     // close layer when click-out
     document.onclick = mclose;
         </script>
